mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NO AS empNo, ADM_DAY AS admDay, GRADU_DAY AS graduDay, SCHOOL_NAME AS schoolName, MAJOR , DEGREE , FIN_YN AS finYn, EDUCATION_SEQ AS educationSeq FROM HM_EDUCATION_INFO where emp_no=#{empNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HM_EDUCATION_INFO ( EMP_NO , ADM_DAY , GRADU_DAY , SCHOOL_NAME , MAJOR , DEGREE , FIN_YN , EDUCATION_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{empNo}, #{admDay}, #{graduDay}, #{schoolName}, #{major}, #{degree}, #{finYn}, EDUCATION_SEQ.nextval )
mapper.update: update HM_EDUCATION_INFO set ADM_DAY =#{admDay}, GRADU_DAY =#{graduDay}, SCHOOL_NAME =#{schoolName}, MAJOR =#{major}, DEGREE =#{degree}, FIN_YN =#{finYn} where EDUCATION_SEQ =#{educationSeq} and EMP_NO =#{empNo}
mapper.delete: delete from HM_EDUCATION_INFO where EDUCATION_SEQ = #{educationSeq} and EMP_NO = #{empNo}
